org.codice.ddf.admin.application.service.impl

Class ApplicationServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.admin.application.service.impl.ApplicationServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ApplicationService, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener

    public class ApplicationServiceImpl
extends Object
implements ApplicationService, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener
    Implementation of the ApplicationService. Uses the karaf features service and bundle state service to determine current state of items in karaf.

    • Constructor Summary

      • isApplicationStarted

        public boolean isApplicationStarted(Application application)
        Description copied from interface: ApplicationService
        Determine if an application is currently started.
        Specified by:
        isApplicationStarted in interface ApplicationService
        Parameters:
        application - Application to check if started.
        Returns:
        true if application is ACTIVE, false if it is FAILED, INACTIVE, or UNKNOWN.
        See Also:
        ApplicationStatus.ApplicationState

      • findFeature

        protected Application findFeature(org.apache.karaf.features.Feature feature,
                                  Set<Application> applications)
        Locates a given feature within the specified set of applications.
        Parameters:
        feature - Feature to look for.
        applications - Set of applications to check for the feature.
        Returns:
        The first application that contains the feature or null if no application contains the feature.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • addApplication

        public void addApplication(URI applicationURL)
                    throws ApplicationServiceException
        Description copied from interface: ApplicationService
        Adds a new application to the application list.

        NOTE: This does NOT start the application
        Specified by:
        addApplication in interface ApplicationService
        Parameters:
        applicationURL - URL location of the application. Currently must be a features repository.
        Throws:
        ApplicationServiceException - If there is an error trying to add the application.
